page.title: 05HOW CHILDREN DRESS IN 1985
page.content: We went round the school to find out what children like to wear.We chose three girls and boys from each class class we asked them,"What colours suit you best?". Most children prefer blue then black then pink and grey then peach and red.Not many children chose green or yellow. Then we asked"Do you you like dark or light colour?" Most children preferred lighter colours. Then we asked what skirts do girls like to wear.Most girls like to wear plain,then leather, then mini and long flowery and frilly.We asked,"What trouser's do you prefer to wear?" Children prefer to wear jeans, then tight trousers,and cotton then baggy. The last question was, "What shoes do you like to wear?" Children liked trainers best which is a canvas sports shoe with a non slip rubber sole. VANESSA,SARAH,LOUISE, aged10
